"開始5087": "自分死亡5087"
"相手死亡5087"
"/mn15 /ci2 1 Oh, perfect timing! We're in a tight spot here! Could you help us out?"
"/mn15 /ci2 1 Thank you, you saved us! I thought the two of us would be enough, but there were more of them than I expected."

"/mn1 Ah... We failed.
I guess we just got in your way. Time to get out of here."
"Dang, I can't move a muscle. This enemy's something else, I tell you..."
"Sorry, Io! I'll handle things here! You just rest!"
"/ci2 1 Io, you need to slow down. Ah, I know how you feel, though. Mind if we cut in?"

"/ci2 2 Yes, we did it, we did it!
When <%me>'s around, we can do anything. Right?"

"Looks like this old girl's done for.
You go ahead, I'll try and help out here!"
"Dang, this is a tough fight..."
"Io, you took on too much at once. I know you're trying to help, but you need to pace yourself."
"/ci2 1 We're here to help! Oh, you got here first. In that case, we'll do what we can to back you up!"
"/mn15 /ci2 1 We did it! That's Guardian power for you! Heh, maybe that's not my place to say. OK, let's start the rescue!"
"/mn1 Gah?! Damn it, I've failed..."
"/mn1 Gah?! Damn it, I've failed..."
"/mn2 Io?! Don't you give up on me now!"
